ModMetaData.name: ACS - Advanced Commercial Server
ModMetaData.author: Georodin
ModMetaData.description:
ACS lets you build Server Racks, install up to 12 Servers per rack, power and cool them, and generate configurable resources. All racks also provide combined research speed when placed next to a High-Tech Research Bench.
— Workflow — • research Servers • fabricate Servers • build Server Racks • fill Server Racks with Servers • power and cool Server Racks • produce Resources (configurable in Mod Settings) • use Research Speed with High-Tech Research Bench
Resources: Silver, Gold, Jade, Plasteel, Steel, Industrial Components, Spacer Components, Neutroamine, Uranium
— October 2025 — • RimWorld 1.6 support (1.5 build maintained) • Core generation system refactor • Custom resource list now persists • Resource settings application/serialization fixed
Maintainer time is limited — contributions welcome (PRs appreciated).
